column4: anyone here use xfce?  i want the right click on desktop to be the xfce menu...w/o all the ubuntu stuff
alright anyone know any good links for a boot splash change howto
but the splash pic needs to be an .xpm
do u know the command for that startup manager?  i don't like the typical ubuntu menus, and i removed them =/
do you have it installed. it is not install by default
are  you trying to change the login window themes/
or just the grub menu backdrop?
nope...that's gdm, got that taken care of....grub menu, i know how to do that...i want to change the splash that goes during boot
thats something I have not played with...dont mind the default progress bar splash.
it completes before all the services are done...like it's fooling me lol....i'll just disable and watch the boot output...thx for ur help
already disabled it ;) worked fine...thx again
